content: NEW YORK  June 7 Shares of Laboratory Corporation of America Holdings could rise by more than 20 percent over the next year on an aging population and a growing number of insured patients  Barron's said in its edition published on Sunday.

title: LabCorp's shares could rise 20 pct in the next year -Barron's
